description:
The 14th Japanese Escape Games series!!

Game system
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and this game goes on.

Story
One day, a man in a white coat appeared.
and made me a proposal in exchange for my freedom.

He wanted me to search and investigate
to search and investigate a floor that exists in a certain building.

I was elated to have the chance to do so.
I entered the floor, but in the blink of an eye

Suddenly, we were locked in.

Oh well. We'll finish the investigation.
We're gonna get out of here, and we're gonna be free.
name: Japanese Escape Games The Light and Mirror Room
